text: "Bad Idea Right?" is a song by American singer-songwriter Olivia Rodrigo from her second studio album, Guts (2023). "Bad Idea Right?" is a rock song with "major '90s pop rock energy" according to Stereogum. Lindsay Zoladz of The New York Times described the song as "a bright, kaleidoscopic head-rush of a pop song". ==References== Category:2023 songs Category:Olivia Rodrigo songs
title: Bad Idea Right?
